component.description: Menu is a navigation component with various customized modes like multi tiers, ipod style sliding and overlays.

attribute.name: model
attribute.description: A menu model instance to create menu programmatically.

attribute.name: trigger
attribute.description: Id of component whose click event will show the dynamic positioned menu.

attribute.name: my
attribute.description: Corner of menu to align with trigger element.

attribute.name: at
attribute.description: Corner of trigger to align with menu element.

attribute.name: overlay
attribute.description: Defines positioning, when enabled menu is displayed with absolute positioning relative to the trigger. Default is false, meaning static positioning.

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: Inline style of the main container element.

attribute.name: styleClass
attribute.description: Style class of the main container element.

attribute.name: triggerEvent
attribute.description: Event name of component that will show the dynamic positioned menu. Default is click.
